text: Risalpur Cantonment railway station () is located in Risalpur, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * Pakistan Locomotive Factory ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Defunct railway stations in Pakistan Category:Railway stations in Nowshera District Category:Railway stations on Nowshera–Dargai Railway Line
title: Risalpur Cantonment railway station
